ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Lvl 31 Equipment Help
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, thanks for all the help.  I forogt to mention that I have a mesh cape. Any suggestions on what to have instead of that?  Also, I have heard that getting
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, thanks for all the help. I forogt to mention that I have a mesh cape.
Any suggestions on what to have instead of that? Also, I have heard that
getting Obsidian Bead Hoops, Dented Brass Mask, and Lumberjacks Cap or Fine
Silk Turban would be a good swap for my other equipment. So, I have figured
that resists seem to be more important than sr, dex, and agi. I guess that
makes sense =)
